items.title: China and Canada announce tariffs relief after a high-stakes meeting between Carney and Xi
items.description: Canola oil and electric cars are at the centre of the deal agreed by Mark Carney and Xi Jinping after years of strained ties.

items.title: Tragic death of Adichie's young son pushes Nigeria to act on health sector failings
items.description: Novelist Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie says her child's death was caused by medical negligence, which the hospital denies.

items.title: Julio Iglesias denies sexual assault allegations
items.description: In a statement, the Spanish singer says the allegations are "absolutely false and deeply sadden me".

items.title: Famed safari park shuts as deadly floods strike South Africa
items.description: Severe flooding believed to be worsened by climate change has killed at least 19 people in South Africa in recent weeks.

items.title: Museveni takes strong lead in early results of Uganda presidential race
items.description: President Museveni has about 76% of the vote with results in from nearly half of all polling stations.
